resources.string:
Warning: this screen contains functionality that may corrupt or delete your database if used improperly. If you don't want to lose your stored numbers, simply hit the BACK button on your device after closing this dialog. Otherwise, read on to find out how to use this screen. 
 Exporting: To export data, type a filename into the text box next to the export button. It must be in the /sdcard directory, and this application will not overwrite pre-existing files. While a file extension isn't necessary, using ".txt" is recommended. Once you have typed a valid filename into the box, click on the Export button and your numbers will be extracted from this application and saved in a human- and computer-readable format. 

 Importing: To import data, you must ensure that the file you specify is on your sdcard. It must also have a "version" number equal to this application's exporting version number. This application is currently exporting files of version %1$s. If no changes are made to the way numbers are exported, your files should be compatible with further versions of this application.
